Blog.post: my sound doesnt work i think im going to cry. anyway i would like to give my apologies to price mathews for making him wait like 4 hours alone and have to buy 2 books at book and music exchange. my sister is PSYCHO. she was suppose to take me, and then she was like nope im not. and then she was like ok. and then she was like no im not taking you. this went on for like 3 hours and finally she decided to take me to hang out with price. well i did get to hang out with price eventually. we hung out at dairy queen for a really long time. and we both didnt have any money left so there wasnt much for us to do. but im glad i got to see him since i usually see him like twice a year. we talked and bonded and it was special. +\I have now been inspired to never eat fast food again. i saw "supersize me" with my aunt and well yeah fuck that, no fastfood is practically impossible. today is going to be reserved for reading. i have to read lord of the flies, which what ive heard is not that bad. And then i have to read some shit book called "The world that trade created: culture, society, and the world economy, 1400 to present" yeah im going to shoot myself in the face before im done with that. WE ARE GOING TO GET ERICA TOMORROW FROM LEXINGTON BE EXCITED BITCHES THIS OPPURTUNITY DOESNT COME AROUND OFTEN. yeahhhhh

i have this song stuck in my head and it wont go away. i sang it in the title of this entry. anyway its SUMMER and people need to have parties and people need to be doing cool stuff but no one does and it makes me mad.

1: Grab the book nearest to you, turn to page 18, find line 4. Write down what it says: '...the association of two or more apparently alien elements on a plane alien to both is the most potent ignition of poetry.' 2: Stretch your left arm out as far as you can. What do you touch first? da speaker 3: What is the last thing you watched on TV?: this movie with hugh grant and sandra bullock 4: WITHOUT LOOKING, guess what the time is: 1:35 5: Now look at the clock, what is the actual time?: 1:42 6: With the exception of the computer, what can you hear?: the air conditioner and my cd player which is playing airbag by radiohead. 7: When did you last step outside? what were you doing?: a little bit ago i thought i heard a car here and my dog barking. 8: Before you came to this website, what did you look at?: random people's websites and profiles. 9: What are you wearing?: black soccer shorts and a t shirt that says south oldham. 10: Did you dream last night? yeah 11: When did you last laugh? when my sister was crying cause my mommy took her keys away. 12: What is on the walls of the room you are in? a lot of writing.. and some posters. and um writing. 13: Seen anything weird lately: not that i recall... 14: What do you think of this quiz?: interesting 15: What is the last film you saw?: Saved! 16: If you became a multi-millionaire overnight, what would you buy first?: a new toothbrush 17: Tell me something about you that I don't know: i have this weird obsession with telling people preposturous things and making them belive them and then being like .. SIKE!!!!! 18: If you could change one thing about the world, regardless of guilt or politics, what would you do?: uhhh beans? 19: Do you like to dance?: yes 20: George Bush: would you rather have al gore running our country? yeah, so shut the fuck up damn liberals. 21: Imagine your first child is a girl, what do you call her?: Charlee 22: Imagine your first child is a boy, what do you call him?: Lennon

my title is what the last thing i copied and pasted was. so yeah yesturday was coo, i went to kirstyns-boyfriends-also known as tucker's swim meet. that lasted for like 20 minutes and then hannah and i talked kirstyn into taking us to bardstown rd. there we went to lots of stores and got really pissed off that we didnt have any money. then we ran into basil and we crilled. thennn we called up alexwinn and he came and sat with us at graeters until it was time to go home. what an exciting day. uhh... i am going to the hootie and the blowfish concert mothafucka! of course with david j and hannah the coolest kids ever. so ericas coming today... uh huh annd my birthday is in a week. (june 21) AND i am painting my room green. \my favorite color\ and im painting over that hideous wall. most of you know which one i am referring to. whats better than winning the special olympics? not being retarded

I've had the song idioteque stuck in my head for ever i even sung it in my title. It is summer. //i got inspired after watching dazed and confused to throw one major kick ass party. its going to happen. and when it does invite everybody you know. it is summer you know.
